deliver_gold_ingot.goal: Start at the world surface, follow a strict tool progression (wood -> stone -> iron), mine gold ore, smelt it into at least 1 gold ingot, then deliver the gold ingot to the nearest player.
instructions: PRECONDITION — SURFACE SAFETY
0. If you spawn underground, inside blocks, or in a confined space, dig upward safely until you reach open air at the surface. Do not begin resource collection until you are on the surface.
PHASE 1 — WOOD + CRAFTING TABLE (do not search for stone, iron, or gold yet)
1. Collect at least 8 logs from nearby trees.
2. Craft the logs into wooden planks.
3. Craft a crafting table and place it on the ground. Treat this location as your base.
PHASE 2 — WOODEN PICKAXE -> COBBLESTONE (do not search for iron or gold yet)
4. Using the crafting table, craft a wooden pickaxe.
5. Mine stone with the wooden pickaxe until you have at least 20 cobblestone total. Stop mining stone once this amount is reached.
PHASE 3 — STONE PICKAXE -> IRON ORE (do not search for gold yet)
6. Using the crafting table, craft a stone pickaxe.
7. Locate a cave or dig down safely to find iron ore.
8. Mine iron ore with the stone pickaxe until you collect at least 3 raw iron. Stop mining iron once this amount is reached.
PHASE 4 — FURNACE + FUEL -> IRON PICKAXE
9. Return to your base (crafting table location).
10. Using the crafting table, craft a furnace using 8 cobblestone and place it next to the crafting table.
11. Collect fuel (at least 8 coal OR create charcoal by smelting logs).
12. Smelt raw iron in the furnace until you have at least 3 iron ingots.
13. Using the crafting table, craft an iron pickaxe.
PHASE 5 — IRON PICKAXE -> GOLD ORE -> GOLD INGOT (do not mine iron anymore)
14. Go underground below Y=32.
15. Mine gold ore with the iron pickaxe until you collect at least 1 raw gold. Stop mining once this amount is reached.
16. Return to your base.
17. Smelt raw gold in the furnace until you have at least 1 gold ingot.
PHASE 6 — DELIVER
18. Locate the nearest player.
19. Walk to the player and drop the gold ingot in front of them.
